name: Remnant (liliasay)
description:
Sometimes it's hard to tell the sleeping  and waking worlds. It's almost like a distant memory, or the remains of a shattered dream. But even if it is a dream,  does that make it any less real? In this game you play as Faye, a dreamer who is struggling to answer that question for herself! Join on her adventure as she fights her way through deadly foes in order to discover the boundaries of dreams and waking.

Use WASD to move and the mouse to both attack and heal!

Remnant was my individual project this semester, which I spent 12 weeks on for my capstone class. Everything except for the environmental art was created by me, including the animations, coding,  and sprite work.  The music  was written and composed by Marcus Asay.

Find more work by me at https://www.artstation.com/liliasay
